post.description:
Upload a media file.

Supported file types:
- Images: jpg, jpeg, png, gif, webp
- Audio: mp3, wav, m4a, aac
- Video: mp4, mov, avi, mkv
- Documents: pdf, doc, docx (metadata only)

Transcribe audio/video file.

Creates a background job to transcribe the audio content.
The job will process the file and extract text with timestamps.

Analyze image content.

Creates a background job to analyze the image using AI.
Can detect objects, faces, text, emotions, and generate descriptions.

post.description:
Import API keys from JSON format.

Args:
    file: JSON file content as bytes
    mode: Import mode - 'skip' (skip if exists), 'update' (update if exists), 'replace' (replace all)
    test_before_import: Whether to test API keys before importing (requires decryption)

Returns:
    JSON response with import statistics
